self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ibragim feels confident in his ability to press and believes he can win if he gets inside, though he acknowledges Chance's strength on the outside.

Chance Shaw.strength: Very difficult to turn inside, strong pronation

Chance Shaw.previous_match_summary: Seen matches where Chance maintains outside control effectively

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ibragim thinks if Morozov gets inside, he wins 90%, but getting there is tough. Overall, hard to predict.
